website_summaries.verdict: An attractive design and warranty, but the Franklin Brass set offers both quality and a better deal.
pros: Modern round shape with a contemporary design
Brushed nickel finish pairs nicely with most décor

customer_reviews.title: Quality Knobs
customer_reviews.text: I've been meaning to replace our bathroom cabinet knobs since we moved in and finally got around to ordering these knobs 5 years later! I ordered them in the evening on Tuesday and they arrived on Friday. They are as advertised, feel sturdy and seem like quality knobs. The screws that came with the knobs didn't quite fit our existing holes/depth, but we used a drill and got all of them replaced within 10 minutes. If this design is your style, then get these! I have more knobs to replace and will probably order from this vendor again once I can decide which style to get...
customer_reviews.author: I. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Great Quality Cabinet Knobs
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful great quality cabinet knobs. We were in the process of remodeling our kitchen and wanted knew cabinet knobs and drawer pulls. We didn't see what we liked in the hardware stores but found these online. The finish is beautiful and the quality is good. The knobs were heavy and worked with the screws that came with them. If anything, I just wish that we were able to purchase some individually as they come in packs of 5 and now I have some extra knobs leftover.
customer_reviews.author: Thuy Trang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Not a single screw in the three different sets I bought fit into the knobs. It was infuriating! I almost returned but then had thinner screws from another dud set I ordered and I just used those instead and it was fine. Seems like poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: fromthevalley

customer_reviews.title: a good heft, and the perfect satin nickel color
customer_reviews.text: Clean lines, a good heft, and the perfect satin nickel color, added a wonderful classy-looking touch to our kitchen remodel. Online shopping allows for obsessing over the minutiae, and I probably spent hours researching different pulls/knobs before deciding on these. It was well worth the time spent. These seem to be of much higher quality than similarly priced items from the "big box" stores, so in addition to getting the selection I wanted, I got a great deal as well.
customer_reviews.author: Darran

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy knobs. High quality with two lengths of screws supplied which I have never seen. In the past I always had to make a hardware store trip to get longer machine screw for the drawers. I do wish that they would provide photos of the knob with the complete side profile visible. This knob has a more rounded shoulder than it appears due to the angle of the photo.
customer_reviews.author: K Gipe

customer_reviews.title: Love these knobs in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Just finished replacing old chrome hardware on my kitchen cabinets with these satin nickel knobs and very pleased with my purchase. I didn't need to replace the screws that were included; the old ones were fine. I paid attention to other reviewers comments, which are always helpful to me, and agree that they have substantial weight and complement stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: FussyLady

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: First set was great, this set were very poorly made . Chips knobs, threads stripped, irregular shape
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, simple, yet with character
customer_reviews.text: These knobs have a weight that feels substantial and solid. The height of the knobs work really well and the angle is high enough to really get an easy pull on these knobs. The profile is minimal and modern and the metal has a nice look with a very slight texture when you get up close. They were easy to install, of course. I paired them with a Southern Hills handle and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item shipped. Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three orders of the Brushed Nickel & received 3 orders of Chrome. After multiple unanswered emails to the company, I am extremely frustrated. I purchased one initial order to validate that I like the product - which I do, so I ordered more to finish my kitchen. We are expecting guests this weekend and will now have an unfinished kitchen. Overall the quality of the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: Non-matching screws
customer_reviews.text: These knobs look good. The package came with two sets of screws. One set was very long. The other set was a little short. Neither sets worked with the knobs. I ended up just using the screws of knobs that these were replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are worth the price. Make sure they are the correct size your looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I had the impression they would be much larger. Love the shape, weight & style. Just wish they were bigger, bolder.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, substantial and solid knobs. I was looking for something that compared to knobs on restoration and rejuvenation without the price tag. These were the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: jillreviewingstuff

customer_reviews.title: ... small set of these just to see if we liked them.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small set of these just to see if we liked them... LOVE them! Heavy Expensive Feel compared to others i ordered. Will be ordering more to finish off our kitchen cabinets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet pull is of the highest quality. The brushed nickel finish is attractive and the material is dense and solid. It was an added advantage to have two sizes of mounting screws in each pack of 5 knobs - a shorter screw for cabinet doors and a longer screw for drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Regis

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this 5 pack - pack contained 2
customer_reviews.text: simple math. received an opened pack with only 2 knobs.
customer_reviews.author: mmamazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: A good match. I was short a few knobs from Lowe’s and these were a perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: dee moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Condition & Fit
customer_reviews.text: The drawer pulls were well packed and easy to install especially since they included both the long and short mounting bolts. I needed both for the cabinets and drawers.
customer_reviews.author: David Giorda

customer_reviews.title: Looks great easy to grasp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Blends well with brushed stainless and brushed nickel decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to order something for our bathroom remodel without seeing it first-hand but these did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Kalymnos Summer

customer_reviews.title: These are the knobs to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, high quality knobs. I’ve also ordered these in gold (and other Southern Hills knobs) & loved them, which is why I’m a repeat customer! I’ve used these on a dresser, night stands, dining room hutch and in a bathroom remodel. Great look in all places.
customer_reviews.author: M & C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and style
customer_reviews.text: We just bought 35 of these knobs. They are a nice weight and they feel and look expensive. They give our kitchen cabinets a very pleasing up-to-date look.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have gone to several cabinet hardware stores as well as the big box stores and have never found a product as high-quality as these knobs and at the price offered. Having both sizes of screws in the package is a huge help. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Eward

customer_reviews.title: Although the knob looks good the screws sent with them didn’t fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was not satisfied with this product. They sent the wrong screws with the knobs and I had to use most of the existing screws on my kitchen cabinets to install.
customer_reviews.author: robin krasnov

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets of these and they are very nice. Excellent value for the price and have good heft to them. They look much more expensive than they were. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Graham

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, go nicely with handles of same design. They are solid and heavy gives sense of quality
customer_reviews.author: Geezer

customer_reviews.title: High recommend
customer_reviews.text: I repainted my bedroom set and there are perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten these for our kitchen and love them so much I reordered some for the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: G. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Super fast one day shipping when we needed one more pack. Easy to install and love the sleek look !!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Donner

customer_reviews.title: Simple, sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to go with a cabinet pull. It's simple lines are what stand out. They are a great weight.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Kominsky

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: We installed the knobs on our new white kitchen cabinets. They're a nice sturdy weight, came with 2 sizes of screws, and installed easily. They look SO nice!
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: They look good. Arrived in less than 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for bathroom cabinets for a remodel. They look good. Arrived in less than 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match !
customer_reviews.text: Matches my brushed nickel faucets. Will install later after remodeling
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Look more expensive than they were
customer_reviews.text: Heavy substantial knobs. Look way more expensive than what was paid here. They look great on my white cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Jml418

customer_reviews.title: We already had some of these from here and loved them, just needed more as we continued to ...
customer_reviews.text: We already had some of these from here and loved them, just needed more as we continued to renovate our kitchen. They are the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Simone Wells

customer_reviews.title: loved the look and feel of these knobs
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Looks great on my loft builtin desk and cabinets
customer_reviews.author: messina8

customer_reviews.title: This is well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Really made the kitchen look brand new! Could not be more pleased took about an hour to replace 40 old knobs.
customer_reviews.author: F. L. Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect pulls
customer_reviews.text: These pulls were for a newly constructed island. They are the perfect size, solid, and a beautiful addition to the island.
customer_reviews.author: kim geist

customer_reviews.title: Great knobs
customer_reviews.text: We installed 46 of these in our kitchen and they look great. These knobs are well constructed and nice and heavy. I highly recommend these knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Look great. Couldn't ask for more
customer_reviews.text: They are very solid. Look great. Couldn't ask for more. Putting them on newly painted cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: very nice finish. very solid
customer_reviews.text: really classy and modern look, very nice finish. very solid. We love these and are replacing several knobs on our cabinets with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The knobs are very nice, solid
customer_reviews.text: Items were shipped promptly. The knobs are very nice, solid, good quality and came with hardware. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Bouffard

customer_reviews.title: Solid heavy quality and beautiful knobs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our new master bath remodel with brushed nickel fixtures everywhere except the bi-fold doors leading to our walk in closets. Remodel Works of Poway, CA did a great job with the design and installation. We picked the light fixtures, mirrors and teak shower stool ( The bi-fold doors came with a small wooden knob that did not fit with the other brushed nickel pulls. This knob by Southern Hills fits perfectly. They provided two screws, a long one for our door and a short one for use on drawers. The knobs are heavy and beautifully constructed. They arrived quickly. High recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Walker, Reviewer and Artist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, heavy knobs. Am looking forward to installing in new kitchen soon.
customer_reviews.author: kware

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Looks exactly as photo. Great quality Thank you
customer_reviews.author: patricia v malecki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There's are gorgeous on my cherry cabinets and of good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these knobs! The are solid and beautiful. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 25 More
customer_reviews.text: Well made and great looking hardware. Offers a classic look with a modern touch. I ordered 25 more pieces to finish the rest of my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cabinet knobs; love the weight and feel! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: fran kors

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful contemporary knobs
customer_reviews.text: These knobs feel solid in your hand and have a clean contemporary look.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hockett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have found them. They are perfect! They look fabulous with our newly lacquered cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: new to amazon purchasing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Exactly as I described. Can't wait to see them in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived packaged very well. The knobs are perfect for my kitchen. They are a good weight and a beautiful finish.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love these! A nice twist on the typical knob
customer_reviews.text: Love these! A nice twist on the typical knob. Easy to install and even came with two sets of screws at different lengths. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Solid, high end look knobs; Brushed Nickel look
customer_reviews.text: These look great in person. I was worried that because they were such a good deal that they wouldn't look as good as the picture, but they look like high end knobs. They are heavy and feel like a solid chunk of metal. They look like a brushed nickel finish, not satin nickel, but that is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These knobs look substantial and nicer than the ones that cost more at the big box stores
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: heavy, large
customer_reviews.text: too heavy and large for my application but if you are looking for that it is a really nice looking and feeling knob
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Solid cabinet knobs for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Solid feeling and easy to install--once I selected the correct mounting hardware--they include mounting screws of two lengths: short and longer. The shorter ones fit my kitchen cabinets. Looks good in my Kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vroom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They Go with any decor style. A Little darker than shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Latin American people

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them . I love the way they look on my cabinets. They are heavy when you take them out of the package which to me always seems to mean high quality. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because I had to send 1 package back, because it wasn't the knobs I ordered. But amazon took care of that really fast for me and I just reordered another package and received the right ones. I have gotten several compliments on our cabinet hardware. These are really worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, heavy weight. These feel substantial and more expensive than they are. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: bchumley

product_meta.title: Southern Hills Brushed Nickel Cabinet Knobs - Pack of 5 -Satin Nickel Drawer Pulls - Round - Pack of 5 - Kitchen Hardware SHKM013-SN-5
product_meta.description: These beautiful, solid, brushed nickel cabinet knobs from Southern Hills will be the perfect finishing touch to your kitchen or bathroom vanity cabinets. The pack of 5 knobs includes 2 lengths of mounting screws (1" and 1.75"). Knobs are 1.25 inches in diameter. These round brushed nickel cabinet knobs from Southern Hills will instantly update your kitchen cabinet doors, cabinet drawers, bathroom vanity, or even a dresser drawer or piece of furniture in need of a facelift. The extra long screws make it possible to use these as bi-fold closet door knobs.
feature_bullets: PACK OF 5: Round 1.25" diameter brushed nickel cabinet knobs
Each brushed nickel cabinet knob is Individually wrapped and bagged to protect the beautiful brushed nickel finish
Easy and inexpensive way to update any cabinet drawers or doors, dresser drawers, bathroom vanity cabinets, or other furniture or bi-fold doors

specifications.Included Components: 5 nickel cabinet knobs and mounting screws
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars115 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
